lines: 1. Khotsi ri da kha Iwe a hu na munwe, U mutsireledzi, fulufhelo,
Shangoni ndi swiswi arali u siho, Ri fhumudze rothe khotsi-ashu.
Khotsi ri da kha â€™we si ri sie;
A ri tshe na Maanda Yesu ri pfe
2. Ri tshi dzhena rothe maswinani ashu, I vha Mukhuthadzi ri lwendoni,
rine ri a ofha khitsi ri khwathise, Nga tshanda tsha Maanda ri phuluse.
3. Ri fhe-vho tshilidzi na luswayo lwau, Bvisa milenzhe yash zwivhini,
Ida u ri bvise kha one mathupho, U swika ri tshi swika tadulu.
